benchmark_details.name: Mementos
benchmark_details.overview: Mementos is a benchmark designed to assess Multimodal Large Language Models' (MLLMs) sequential image reasoning abilities through diverse image sequences and associated human-annotated descriptions.

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To investigate the capabilities of Multimodal Large Language Models (MLLMs) in dynamic reasoning across image sequences.

data.source: Comprises images selected from Daily-life scenarios, Robotics tasks, and Comics, systematically extracted and annotated.
data.annotation: Human-annotated descriptions capturing sequential events in the images.

methodology.calculation: Metrics are computed by matching AI-generated and human-annotated keywords.
methodology.interpretation: Scores indicating effective recognition of objects and behaviors in images, with higher scores reflecting better reasoning capabilities.
methodology.baseline_results: Performance of nine MLLMs evaluated on Mementos.
